heroTitle: Does your business not yet have an online presence?
heroSubtitle: Grow your sales, attract more customers and stand out from the competition with a professional, fast and optimized website. I can help you achieve it!
WebSolutionsTitle: We Create Websites Adapted to Your Needs
WebSolutionsDescription: Discover the web solutions we offer for different types of businesses. We take your digital presence to the next level.
onlineStoresDesc: Sell your products 24/7 with a modern and easy-to-use online store.
freelancersDesc: Showcase your portfolio and attract clients with a professional site.
newEntrepreneursDesc: Bring your idea to life with a website that stands out.
appointmentsServicesDesc: Simplify appointment management with a functional website.
homeServicesDesc: Reach more customers with a platform tailored to your services.
tourismCompaniesDesc: Promote your destinations and tourism services with style.
entertainmentDesc: Promote events, shows and entertainment services.
influencersDesc: Ideal for content creators looking to improve their social media presence.
testimonialsDescription: Testimonials from clients from different sectors, satisfied with our web solutions.
testimonial1Highlight: 50% more sales in the first month
testimonial1: Thanks to this solution, my XYZ online store increased its sales by 50% in the first month.
testimonial2: As a freelancer, I can now display my portfolio and schedule meetings with clients easily.
testimonial3: Launching my new venture was easier with the professional website. Our first clients were delighted.
testimonial4: The online appointment scheduling feature made it much easier to organize my consultations, saving time and avoiding confusion.
testimonial5: My clients can request home services from their cell phone, increasing my clientele and service satisfaction.
testimonial6: My tourism agency now displays tours in an attractive way and clients can book online without problems.
testimonial7: The renewed website for my entertainment business attracted more young audiences and multiplied reservations for events.
testimonial8: As an influencer, my personal website helps me connect with my audience and promote my collaborations in a professional manner.
faqDescription: Here you will find answers to the most common questions about our services and website.

faq1.question: How can I hire your services?
faq1.answer: You can hire our services directly through our website, where you will find a contact form or the option to schedule a consultation.

faq2.question: Do you offer technical support after implementation?
faq2.answer: Yes, we offer ongoing technical support to ensure your website runs perfectly and resolve any issues you may have.

faq3.question: How long does it take to develop a website?
faq3.answer: Development time varies depending on the specific needs of the project, but generally takes between 4 to 8 weeks from planning to final delivery.

faq4.question: Can you help me with search engine optimization (SEO)?
faq4.answer: Of course, we implement SEO strategies during development to improve your website's visibility in search engines.

faq5.question: Do you offer custom designs?
faq5.answer: Yes, every website we develop is unique and tailored to your brand's identity and goals, ensuring a distinctive online presence.

resumeDescription: In this section, you can view my resume or download it in PDF format. This document details my professional experience, skills, education, and more.
privacyPolicyParagraph1: At my website, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This document details how we collect, use, and protect the information you share with us.
privacyPolicySection1Description: We may collect the following information:
privacyPolicySection1Item3: Subject and message content sent through our contact form
privacyPolicySection2Description: We use your data solely to:
privacyPolicySection2Item1: Respond to your inquiries or messages sent through the contact form
privacyPolicySection2Item2: Send notifications related to your inquiry
privacyPolicySection3Description: We implement security measures to protect your data. However, no system is completely secure, so we cannot guarantee absolute security.
privacyPolicySection4FinalSentence: You can exercise these rights by sending us an email at: correo@ejemplo.com.
privacyPolicySection5Description: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy. Any changes will be posted on this page.
privacyPolicyFinalParagraph: If you have any questions, contact us at correo@ejemplo.com.

validation.privacyConsentRequired: You must accept the Privacy Policy.

contactDescription: If you have any questions or proposals, feel free to send me a message through the contact form.
contact.successMessage: Form submitted successfully. We have sent a confirmation to your email.
contact.errorMessage: There was an error sending the form. Please try again.
